customer_name: Down By The Creek Companion Animal Sanctuary
site_name: DOWN BY THE CREEK COMPANION ANIMAL SANCTUARY

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm on
22-MAY-19. The licensee was leaving the facility for an exhibit as the inspector arrived. The licensee indicated she
would not be returning for a few hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm  on
22-MAY-19.  The licensee was leaving the facility for an exhibit as the inspector arrived.  The licensee indicated she
would not be returning for a few hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
